CustomField.formula:
(Boys_1pm_5pm__c + Boys_5am_9am__c + Boys_5pm_9pm__c + Boys_9am_1pm__c
+ Men_5am_9am__c + Men_9am_1pm__c + Men_1pm_5pm__c + Men_5pm_9pm__c
+ Women_5am_9am__c + Women_9am_1pm__c + Women_1pm_5pm__c + Women_5pm_9pm__c
+ Girls_5am_9am__c + Girls_9am_1pm__c + Girls_1pm_5pm__c + Girls_5pm_9pm__c
+ Boys_Misc__c + Men_Misc__c + Women_Misc__c + Girls_Misc__c
+ X1pm_5pm_Misc__c + X5am_9am_Misc__c + X5pm_9pm_Misc__c + X9am_1pm_Misc__c) /
Days_Since_Last_Collection__c
CustomField.label: Total Customers per Day
